noez.relocator.tooltip1: §6§lOn use:§r Blink to a short distance where you facing
noez.moonsilver_sword.tooltip1: §6§lPassive:§r Deal extra Magic Damage to undead
noez.natura_blade.tooltip1: §6§lOn attack:§r Fire a spike dealing damage, §eRoot§r target and gain you §dRegeneration
noez.iridescent_bow.tooltip2: §7§oIridescent Arrow: Not affected by gravity, pierces through targets and deals True Damage
noez.hellfire_sword.tooltip1: §6§lPassive:§r Set target on fire. For each target set on fire by this sword, you gain %s bonus damage (Up to: %s stacks)
noez.hellfire_sword.tooltip2: §7§oLose all Bonus Damage if you stop attacking for 5 seconds
noez.frostbane_sword.tooltip1: §6§lPassive:§r Deals more damage to targets immune to fire.
noez.windbreaker.tooltip1: §6§lPassive:§r Deal more damage depends on your falling distance up to 25 blocks
noez.windbreaker.tooltip2: If your falling distance is 10 blocks or more, inflict §4Armor Crunch §rto target and deal damage to all creatures around
noez.dark_devastation.tooltip1: §6§lOn attack:§r Inflict §8Corruption§r to target. If target already had the effect, increase the amplify by 1 (Up to: 5 stacks)
noez.blood_sacrifice.tooltip1: §6§lOn attack:§r Deals small damage to all entities around
noez.mechanical_crossbow.tooltip1: §6§lPassive:§r Reload up to 4 projectiles of the same type simultaneously.
noez.soul_pearl.tooltip1: §6§lOn teleport:§r Deal magic damage to all entities around
noez.crimson_soul_eater.tooltip1: §6§lPassive:§r If target's health is lower than 10%, §4Execute§r target and heal you 10% target's max health
noez.crimson_soul_eater.tooltip2: §6§lOn attack:§r Deal more damage base on target lost health
noez.void_stalker.tooltip1: §6§lOn shot:§r Convert any arrows into §dVoid Arrow
noez.void_stalker.tooltip2: §7§oVoid Arrow: When hit have chance to pull any entities toward its position
noez.echo_none.tooltip1: §5§lHalf Set:§7 Reveal all entities around you
noez.echo_half.tooltip1: §5§lHalf Set:§r Reveal all entities around you
noez.echo_full.tooltip1: §5§lHalf Set:§r Reveal all entities around you
noez.echo_elytra.tooltip1: §6§lPassive:§r The first time you enter fall fly, greatly boost your fly speed
